name: BreakingPlatforming
description: "Platformer level creators hate this one simple trick!"

noCheckpointsNotify.name: Notify if No Checkpoints
noCheckpointsNotify.description: Notifies you if a platformer level has no checkpoints.

numCheckpointsNotify.name: Notify Number of Checkpoints
numCheckpointsNotify.description:
Notifies you of the number of checkpoints in a platformer level.

Does not require previous setting ("Notify if No Checkpoints") to be enabled.

notifDura.name: Checkpoint Notifications Duration
notifDura.description:
Set the duration (in seconds) of the notification showing the number of checkpoints in a platformer level.

If "Notify if No Checkpoints" is enabled, the notification for levels without checkpoints will last twice of what's set here (example: setting this option to "10" would you a notification that lasts for at most 20 seconds in platformer levels without checkpoints).

noPlatformerJumpAnim.name: Disable Platformer Jump Anim
noPlatformerJumpAnim.description: Disables the squishing animation cubes make when jumping in place.

checkpointCompatibility.name: Checkpoint Notif Compat
checkpointCompatibility.description: Enabling this prevents you from entering the garage before entering a custom editor level. Leaving this disabled will lead to a crash. Any crash reports caused by leaving this setting disabled after v1.1.1 of this mod was released will be ignored.

enableOnRated.name: Enable Below on Rated Levels
enableOnRated.description: Toggles all settings below this one on rated levels.

ignoreHazardHitboxes.name: Ignore Hitboxes on Hazards
ignoreHazardHitboxes.description:
Ignores hitboxes from all hazards. (Enabling this option will break the mod's "ExtraSticky" and "ScaleStick" options)

<cy>By enabling this option, you agree to hold harmless the developer (RayDeeUx) and all Geode lead developers for any resulting damages, including potential in-game bans of any extent.</c>

passableBlock.name: Mark Blocks As Passable
passableBlock.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option forces blocks to be <cp>passable</c>. This particular setting applies to <cj>solid blocks</c>.

 <cj>Slopes</c> <cr>cannot</c> be marked <cp>passable</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

breakableBlockPassable.name: Mark Breakables As Passable
breakableBlockPassable.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option forces blocks to be <cp>passable</c>. This particular setting applies to <cj>breakable blocks</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

multiActivate.name: Mark All MultiActivate
multiActivate.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>allows</c> all <cj>gameplay elements</c> to be <cp>activated multiple times</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

gripSlope.name: Mark All GripSlope
gripSlope.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>increases</c> the <cp>grip</c> the player has on <cj>all slopes</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

dontBoostX.name: Mark All DontBoostX
dontBoostX.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>prevents</c> the player from having its <cp>motion</c> <cg>boosted</c> on the <cp>X axis</c> by <cj>objects</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

dontBoostY.name: Mark All DontBoostY
dontBoostY.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>prevents</c> the player from having its <cp>motion</c> <cg>boosted</c> on the <cp>Y axis</c> by <cj>objects</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

nonStickX.name: Mark All NonStickX
nonStickX.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>prevents</c> the player from <cp>moving along</c> with <cj>objects</c> on the <cp>X axis</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

nonStickY.name: Mark All NonStickY
nonStickY.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>prevents</c> the player from <cp>moving along</c> with <cj>objects</c> on the <cp>Y axis</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

extraSticky.name: Mark All ExtraSticky
extraSticky.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>forces</c> <cj>downward-moving objects</c> to be <cp>extra sticky</c> to the player.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

scaleStick.name: Mark All ScaleStick
scaleStick.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>forces</c> the player to <cp>move away</c> or <cp>closer to</c> the <cp>center</c> of a <cj>scaling object</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

extendColl.name: Mark All Extended Collision
extendColl.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>re-calculates</c> the <cp>hitboxes</c> of <cj>all objects scaled larger than 6x</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

iceBlock.name: Mark All IceBlock
iceBlock.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>enables</c> <cp>ice physics</c> from <cj>all objects</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.

audioScale.name: Mark No Audio Scale
audioScale.description:
According to the <cb>GD Editor Guide</c> by <cy>ViPriN</c> + <co>AutoNick</c>,
this option <cr>prevents</c> all <cj>pulsing objects and orbs</c> from <cp>pulse</c> with <cp>background music/SFX</c>.

<cr>-1</c>: Mark this as <cr>false</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
 <cy>0</c>: Leave this option <cy>untouched</c>.
 <cg>1</c>: Mark this as <cg>true</c> on <cj>relevant objects</c>.
